content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully created on the map. Multiple attempts were made to craft and place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs; however, all such attempts failed. Although the agent interacted with existing furnaces (for smelting iron and copper plates) by retrieving them (e.g. at positions (5.0, 5.0) and (–27.0, –60.0)), these operations used pre‐existing entities rather than constructing a new structure.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Errors with get_entities
  – Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. 'radius') or extra positional arguments.
  – Confirm the function’s signature and call get_entities with the expected parameters.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures
  – Validate inventory before attempting to place a Lab to prevent errors such as “No lab in inventory.”
  – Check that the result of entity-retrieval calls is not None before iterating over it.
  – Ensure that all prerequisite resources and sub-ingredients (e.g. iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables) are available or can be produced before attempting Lab crafting.
  – Review and complete necessary production or smelting steps so that resource transformation processes meet the Lab’s recipe requirements.
